name: tm36
effect: Teaches Sludge Bomb to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Sludge Bomb to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Selfdestruct)

flavor_text.sun-moon: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
